snippet.title: Grid Force - Mask of the Goddess - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Conquer the grid in REAL-TIME in this tactical bullet-hell RPG with a large, diverse roster of heroes to recruit and evolve, lightning-fast combat, and a deep story that adapts to your choices. 

Play as Donna, guide her on a journey through the world of Gora, make tough choices that change the course of her story, and defeat the goddesses of Gora to save the future.

RELEASE DATE: 11th of August, 2022

Wishlist on Steam today! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1379960/Grid_Force__Mask_Of_The_Goddess/

Learn more: https://www.playtra.com/grid-force-mask-of-the-goddess

FOLLOW DREAMNAUTS:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Playtra_Games 
Website: https://www.playtra.com/ 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/grid-force
